mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plandays (plan_id, day, date) VALUES (#{planId}, #{day}, #{date})
mapper.update: UPDATE plandays SET day = #{day}, date = #{date}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE plandays SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM plandays WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT * FROM plandays WHERE plan_id = #{planId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY date ASC
